Facilities.description: Harvard Stadium is a football stadium located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, on the campus of Harvard University. The stadium was built in 1903 and is the home of the Harvard Crimson football team.

Facilities.description: Shoreline Amphitheatre is an outdoor amphitheater located in Mountain View, California. It is a popular venue for concerts and other events. The amphitheater was built in 1986 and has a capacity of 22,500 people.

Facilities.description: The Doris and Donald Fisher Museum of Art is an art museum located on the campus of Stanford University in Stanford, California. The museum's collection includes over 40,000 works of art, including paintings, sculptures, drawings, prints, and photographs.

Facilities.name: Cambridge University Botanic Garden
Facilities.description: The Cambridge University Botanic Garden is a botanical garden located in Cambridge, England. The garden was founded in 1762 and is one of the oldest botanical gardens in the world. The garden houses a collection of over 8,000 plant species from around the world.
